it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Interface ClientInterfaceRMI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientRMI

    public interface ClientInterfaceRMI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Client Interface RMI class

    This interface is used by the SERVER in order to call the below listed methods and communicate with the client

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Method used to export the ClientInterfaceRMI to the server
      void parseAction(ActionResponse actionResponse)
      Method used to parse the action message
      void parseMessage(Message message)
      Method used to parse the message
      void print(java.lang.String infoString)
      Method used to print information on the user screen
      void sendWindowChoicesToPlayer(java.util.List<WindowPatternCard> windowPatternCards)
      Method used to send to the player an array of choices of window pattern cars When the player will make the choice it will send it to the server
      void setPlayer(Player player)
      Method used to set the player by the server
      void setReceivedWindowPattern() 
      void startGameInClient()

    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to print information on the user screen

        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a Remote error occurs

      • sendWindowChoicesToPlayer

        void sendWindowChoicesToPlayer(java.util.List<WindowPatternCard> windowPatternCards)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to send to the player an array of choices of window pattern cars When the player will make the choice it will send it to the server
        Parameters:
        windowPatternCards - list of window pattern cards
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occures
